## getNodeStats() function

Gets default rolled up node stats within a quantile range.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getNodeStats(table: ColumnTable, quantile?: number): Record<string, any> | {
    minX: number;
    maxX: number;
    minY: number;
    maxY: number;
    minD: number;
    maxD: number;
}[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | assumed pre-grouped table (e.g., by parent id) |
|  quantile | number | <i>(Optional)</i> quanitile value (0-1) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, any&gt; \| { minX: number; maxX: number; minY: number; maxY: number; minD: number; maxD: number; }\[\]
